entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Bracebridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:04 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this morning then cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning this afternoon. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light before morning. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 20.
